alert.note: Alert for Bingham; Bonneville; Butte; Jefferson (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 3:09PM MDT until August 13 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Idaho... East central Butte County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bonneville County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 309 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Central Inl, or 20 miles east of Arco, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Central Inl and Southeast Inl. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
